original_text: The friends of the officer then returned to his house. When they arrived there, they saw that the servant was well again.
korean_text: 보내었던 사람들이 집으로 돌아가 보매 종이 이미 나아 있었더라

sentences.original_text: The friends of the officer then returned to his house.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 장교의 친구들은 그의 집으로 돌아갔다.

sentences.original_text: they saw that the servant was well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 종이 다시 건강해진 것을 보았다.
